game.name: Fashion Cover Diva
game.description:
Do you think that you are a fashion expert? Is dressing a beautiful model your biggest dream of life? Luckily, we have got you covered today with a brand new girls game where you can practice your designer abilities by preparing the awesome outfits for the top six models of your city. Is not pretty exciting and challenging? Join Fashion Cover Diva and be prepared to guide these beauties to pick up their desired looks! You would have plenty of outfit and accessory options in their wardrobe.

These cute and beautiful girls want to be prepared for a photo shooting session and you are the only one who can help them to make them look great. Try to mix and match all the outfit options that you see in their wardrobe to choose the best one for each princess! Select your character first and then get ready to select a long skirt or dress her up with a blue jeans or blue or black short skirt and combine it with a matching crop top! Choose a lovely and matching jacket for your gorgeous girl.

Now you have to finalize a matching pair of cool shoes or sandals.  Give your girl a fabulous handbag and then complete her look with fine jewelry items in this one of the best html5 dressing games! Click the next button and then be prepared to follow the same process for the other five princesses as well! Try to put your best to make all these top models look awesome on the cover page of the magazine! We have countless dress up games for girls available for you. So try them one by one and have fun with your friends without download on your device.
